alot of season 2 sound is missin. i used mkvmerge gui v5.5.0 to strip the audio off the lower quality episodes and merge them onto these rips. there is a few second lag, but with vlc player u can set the audio correctly. with another program u could get the audio exact, but im 2 lazy for that.
